snippet: In January, we followed Tomas Gajdos during his first season — from London to Paris and from castings to fittings — as he tried to break into the fashion business.

byline.original: By FRITZIE ANDRADE and TAIGE JENSEN

lead_paragraph: In January, we followed Tomas Gajdos during his first season — from London to Paris and from castings to fittings — as he tried to break into the fashion business.

headline.seo: Following a Male Model Through His First Fashion Week
headline.main: The Making of a Male Model
